data.title: Holland Grey Overmantle Mirror 71x93cm
data.meta_description: View Holland Grey Overmantle Mirror 71x93cm. Minimal dark grey overmantle wall mirror. Slim arch shaped fireplace design featuring a bevel edge mirror.
data.text:
Product Description

Holland Grey Overmantle Mirror

Introducing the Holland Grey Overmantle Mirror, measuring (H) 71cm x (W) 93cm (2ft 3.9″ x 3ft 0.6″) weighing (8kg). A sophisticated addition to your living space that seamlessly blends minimalism and sleek design. Crafted with precision and care, this overmantle mirror is not just a reflection but a statement piece that enhances the aesthetic of any room. View the Holland Mirror collection.

Key Features:

Contemporary Minimalism: Embrace the beauty of simplicity with the minimal and sleek design of the Holland Grey Overmantle Mirror. Its understated elegance effortlessly complements modern interiors. Expertly encased within a narrow timber frame and backing. Constructed from high-quality engineered wood, each piece is meticulously hand-finished in radiant gold, exuding luxury and sophistication.

Hand-Finished Matt Dark Grey: Meticulously constructed from high-quality moisture resistant engineered wood and hand-finished in a luxurious Matt Dark Grey, this mirror exudes a premium feel that adds a touch of sophistication to your space. The Holland is also available in chic matt black, shimmering silver, and opulent gold, ensuring a perfect match for any interior aesthetic.

Made to Order in London: This mirror is carefully crafted to order in London, ensuring a personalized touch and attention to detail. Elevate your home with a unique piece tailored to your specifications.

Premium 25mm Bevel Edge Mirror: Experience the finest in mirror craftsmanship with a premium 25mm bevel edge. This attention to detail not only enhances the mirror’s aesthetics but also reflects a commitment to quality.

Ready to Hang or Position: Enjoy flexibility in styling your space with the Holland Grey Overmantle Mirror. Whether you choose to hang it above your mantelpiece or position it as a standalone statement, this mirror is ready to enhance your decor.
